message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I am confident it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special offer of $12,500 for this product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity for us to collaborate on a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our interests.
